displayName.english: The Shimmering Horizon and Cursed Blacksmith
displayName.japanese: 蒼キ光と魔剣の鍛冶師
displayName.schinese: 苍色之光与魔剑锻造师
displayName.tchinese: 蒼色之光與魔劍鍛造師

description.english: Obtain all achievements.
description.japanese: すべてのアチーブメントを達成する
description.schinese: 达成所有成就
description.tchinese: 達成所有成就

description.english: Reach the Safehouse.
description.japanese: 避難所にたどり着く
description.schinese: 抵达避难所
description.tchinese: 抵達避難所

description.english: Defeat the threat in Unknown Castle Ruin.
description.japanese: 名もなき城跡にいる強敵を倒す
description.koreana: 이름 없는 성터에 있는 강적을 쓰러뜨린다
description.schinese: 打倒位于不知名的城堡遗址的强敌
description.tchinese: 打倒位於不知名的城堡遺址的強敵

description.english: Defeat the threat in Depths of the Forest of Hesitation.
description.japanese: 混迷の森　深部にいる強敵を倒す
description.koreana: 혼미의 숲　심부에 있는 강적을 쓰러뜨린다
description.schinese: 打倒位于困惑的森林深处的强敌
description.tchinese: 打倒位於困惑的森林深處的強敵

description.english: Defeat the threat in Battlefield of Twist.
description.japanese: 紆曲の戦場にいる強敵を倒す
description.schinese: 打倒位于蜿蜒的战场的强敌
description.tchinese: 打倒位於蜿蜒的戰場的強敵

description.english: Defeat the threat in Garden of Facade.
description.japanese: 虚妄の花園にいる強敵を倒す
description.schinese: 打倒位于虚伪的花园的强敌
description.tchinese: 打倒位於虛偽的花園的強敵

displayName.english: Crown Tainted With Its Own Blood
displayName.japanese: 自らの血に染まった王冠

description.english: Defeat the threat in The Castle of the Lord.
description.japanese: 魔王殿にいる強敵を倒す
description.schinese: 打倒位于魔王殿的强敌
description.tchinese: 打倒位於魔王殿的強敵

displayName.english: The Joker Who Brought Victory to Mankind
displayName.japanese: 人間に勝利をもたらした道化師
displayName.schinese: 为人类带来胜利的小丑
displayName.tchinese: 為人類帶來勝利的小丑

description.english: Defeat the threat in The Deep Ends of Hell.
description.japanese: 煉獄の果てにいる強敵を倒す
description.schinese: 打倒位于炼狱尽头的强敌
description.tchinese: 打倒位於煉獄盡頭的強敵

displayName.english: Towards The Deep Ends Of Hell...
displayName.japanese: 煉獄の果てまで、何度でも…

description.english: Start another cursed spiral.
description.japanese: 新たな呪いの連鎖を始める
description.schinese: 开始另一段诅咒的轮迴
description.tchinese: 開始另一段詛咒的輪迴

displayName.japanese: 蒼剣・アズライハート

description.english: Unleash another possibility for the Cursed Sword.
description.japanese: 呪われし剣の新たな可能性を解放する
description.schinese: 解放受诅咒的剑的另一个可能性
description.tchinese: 解放受詛咒的劍的另一個可能性

description.english: Listen to the melody that decorates the Safehouse.
description.japanese: 避難所を彩る音色に耳を傾ける
description.schinese: 聆听点缀避难所的轻柔音色
description.tchinese: 聆聽點綴避難所的輕柔音色

description.english: Help improve the living experience in the Safehouse.
description.japanese: 避難所の住み心地の改善に手伝う
description.schinese: 协助改善避难所的居住环境
description.tchinese: 協助改善避難所的居住環境

description.english: Satiate one's rather picky hunger.
description.japanese: 味にうるさい舌を満足させる
description.schinese: 填饱难以获得满足的胃
description.tchinese: 填飽難以獲得滿足的胃

description.english: Demonstrate your colorful crafting skills.
description.japanese: 虹色に光る鍛冶の腕を披露する
description.schinese: 展现七彩缤纷的锻造技术
description.tchinese: 展現七彩繽紛的鍛造技術

description.english: Seek for recollection through the records.
description.japanese: 記録に潜む思い出の何かを探す
description.koreana: 기록 속에 숨은 추억의 무언가를 찾는다
description.schinese: 寻找潜藏于纪录之中的回忆之物
description.tchinese: 尋找潛藏於紀錄之中的回憶之物

description.english: Be acknowledged by those who rule the Demons.
description.japanese: 魔族を統べしものに認められる
description.schinese: 获得魔族统治者的认可
description.tchinese: 獲得魔族統治者的認可

description.english: ... One more look at this lantern, and you might just hurt your eyes.
description.japanese: …これ以上ランタンを見続けても、目に悪いだけ。
description.koreana: …이젠 랜턴을 계속 보고 있어도, 눈만 해로울 뿐이다.
description.schinese: ……再继续看著提灯，只会让你的眼睛不舒服而已
description.tchinese: ……再繼續看著提燈，只會讓你的眼睛不舒服而已

displayName.japanese: ポーションジャンキー

description.english: Um... You do know you won't get stronger the more you drink, right?
description.japanese: あの…飲めば飲むほどいいわけではありませんので。
description.koreana: 저…계속 마신다고 더 좋아지는 건 아니에요.
description.schinese: 那个……药水不是喝越多越好喔
description.tchinese: 那個……藥水不是喝越多越好喔

displayName.japanese: 購入特典はありません

description.english: Meow! I never thought you'd be so generous that I can't keep up with the restock!
description.japanese: にゃにゃ！？こんなに太っ腹だったとは！また仕入れ頑張らにゃいと…
description.koreana: 냐냥!? 이렇게나 통 큰 녀석이었냥! 앞으로도 열심히 물량 확보에 힘써야겠다냥…
description.schinese: 喵喵！？我都不知道你出手这麽豪迈喵！我要赶快再进货才行喵……
description.tchinese: 喵喵！？我都不知道你出手這麼豪邁喵！我要趕快再進貨才行喵……

description.english: Well. I guess now I HAVE to fix this weapon no matter what. Big sister's duty!
description.japanese: その顔をされたら、お姉ちゃん意地でもこれを直すしかないよね。
description.koreana: 그런 표정을 지으면, 누나가 악착같이 고쳐줄 수밖에 없잖아.
description.schinese: 看你那个样子，大姊姊不努力修好这把武器都不行了呢
description.tchinese: 看你那個樣子，大姊姊不努力修好這把武器都不行了呢

description.english: Disgusting. I expect nothing less for a filthy Human.
description.japanese: こんな性懲りもなく…愚かな人間が考えそうな趣味だな。
description.koreana: 정말 질리지도 않고…어리석은 인간이 가질 법한 취미군.
description.schinese: 我看你根本只是想被虐待吧……也只有人类才想得到这种噁心的癖好
description.tchinese: 我看你根本只是想被虐待吧……也只有人類才想得到這種噁心的癖好

displayName.english: License for serving the Demon Lord
displayName.japanese: 魔王の傍で仕える資格

description.english: Though the world may never know, please, indulge yourself. Bask in your accomplishments without reservation.
description.japanese: 世間の人々は永遠に知ることはないだろうが、君には十分な資格があるよ。
description.koreana: 세상 모두가 영원히 알지 못하겠지만, 너에게는 충분한 자격이 있느니라.
description.schinese: 世人或许永远不会知晓，但你无庸置疑值得拥有这个称号
description.tchinese: 世人或許永遠不會知曉，但你無庸置疑值得擁有這個稱號

description.english: Forge 5 weapons.
description.japanese: 武器を５回作る
description.schinese: 锻造武器5次
description.tchinese: 鍛造武器5次

description.english: Forge 50 weapons.
description.japanese: 武器を５０回作る
description.schinese: 锻造武器50次
description.tchinese: 鍛造武器50次

description.english: Forge 250 weapons.
description.japanese: 武器を２５０回作る
description.schinese: 锻造武器250次
description.tchinese: 鍛造武器250次

displayName.japanese: 泣いてなんかないもん

description.english: Break 5 weapons.
description.japanese: 武器が５回壊れる
description.schinese: 武器毁坏5次
description.tchinese: 武器毀壞5次

description.english: Break 50 weapons.
description.japanese: 武器が５０回壊れる
description.schinese: 武器毁坏50次
description.tchinese: 武器毀壞50次

description.english: Break 250 weapons.
description.japanese: 武器が２５０回壊れる
description.schinese: 武器毁坏250次
description.tchinese: 武器毀壞250次

displayName.schinese: 发出一阵强光后消失了
displayName.tchinese: 發出一陣強光後消失了

description.english: Break 1 accessory.
description.japanese: アクセサリーが１回壊れる
description.schinese: 饰品毁坏1次
description.tchinese: 飾品毀壞1次

description.english: Break 10 accessories.
description.japanese: アクセサリーが１０回壊れる
description.schinese: 饰品毁坏10次
description.tchinese: 飾品毀壞10次

description.english: Break 70 accessories.
description.japanese: アクセサリーが７０回壊れる
description.schinese: 饰品毁坏70次
description.tchinese: 飾品毀壞70次

description.english: Move 20 times via Skills.
description.japanese: 「前進」スキルを２０回発動する
description.schinese: 使用「移动」类战技20次
description.tchinese: 使用「移動」類戰技20次

description.english: Move 200 times via Skills.
description.japanese: 「前進」スキルを２００回発動する
description.schinese: 使用「移动」类战技200次
description.tchinese: 使用「移動」類戰技200次

description.english: Jump 20 times via Skills.
description.japanese: 「ジャンプ」スキルを２０回発動する
description.schinese: 使用「跳跃」类战技20次
description.tchinese: 使用「跳躍」類戰技20次

description.english: Jump 200 times via Skills.
description.japanese: 「ジャンプ」スキルを２００回発動する
description.schinese: 使用「跳跃」类战技200次
description.tchinese: 使用「跳躍」類戰技200次

description.english: Cause knockback 20 times via Skills.
description.japanese: 「吹き飛ばし・後退」スキルを２０回発動する
description.schinese: 使用「击飞、击退」类战技20次
description.tchinese: 使用「擊飛、擊退」類戰技20次

description.english: Cause knockback 200 times via Skills.
description.japanese: 「吹き飛ばし・後退」スキルを２００回発動する
description.schinese: 使用「击飞、击退」类战技200次
description.tchinese: 使用「擊飛、擊退」類戰技200次

description.english: Fire elemental projectiles 10 times via Skills.
description.japanese: 「元素射出」スキルを１０回発動する
description.schinese: 使用「元素箭」类战技10次
description.tchinese: 使用「元素箭」類戰技10次

description.english: Fire elemental projectiles 100 times via Skills.
description.japanese: 「元素射出」スキルを１００回発動する
description.schinese: 使用「元素箭」类战技100次
description.tchinese: 使用「元素箭」類戰技100次

description.english: Let go of your body 3 times.
description.japanese: 体を３回捨てる
description.schinese: 放弃躯体3次
description.tchinese: 放棄軀體3次

description.english: Let go of your body 10 times.
description.japanese: 体を１０回捨てる
description.schinese: 放弃躯体10次
description.tchinese: 放棄軀體10次

description.english: Return to the Safehouse safely 5 times.
description.japanese: 無事に避難所に５回戻る
description.schinese: 安全返回避难所5次
description.tchinese: 安全返回避難所5次

displayName.japanese: ちょっと散歩してくる

description.english: Return to the Safehouse safely 50 times.
description.japanese: 無事に避難所に５０回戻る
description.schinese: 安全返回避难所50次
description.tchinese: 安全返回避難所50次

description.english: Block 200 times.
description.japanese: ブロックを２００回発生させる
description.schinese: 触发格挡200次
description.tchinese: 觸發格擋200次

description.english: Teleport 200 times.
description.japanese: 転移を３０回発生させる
description.schinese: 触发转移30次
description.tchinese: 觸發轉移30次

description.english: Obtain a weapon with its Mass of 20 or higher.
description.japanese: 質量が２０以上の武器を手に入れる
description.schinese: 获得质量达20以上的武器
description.tchinese: 獲得質量達20以上的武器

displayName.japanese: ダイヤモンドより砕けない

description.english: Obtain a weapon with its Tenacity of 150 or higher.
description.japanese: 強度が１５０以上の武器を手に入れる
description.schinese: 获得韧度达150以上的武器
description.tchinese: 獲得韌度達150以上的武器

description.english: Obtain a weapon with its Magic of 90 or higher.
description.japanese: 魔力が９０以上の武器を手に入れる
description.schinese: 获得魔力达90以上的武器
description.tchinese: 獲得魔力達90以上的武器

description.english: Perform a Skill with its level Maxed out.
description.japanese: レベルMaxのスキルを発動する
description.schinese: 发动等级达Max的战技
description.tchinese: 發動等級達Max的戰技

description.english: Obtain a weapon with its enhance limit of 10 or higher.
description.japanese: 強化上限が１０以上の武器を手に入れる
description.schinese: 获得强化上限达10以上的武器
description.tchinese: 獲得強化上限達10以上的武器

displayName.english: The Blacksmith Of The Iron Fist

description.english: Defeat 5 enemies with a normal attack, without equipping a weapon.
description.japanese: 武器を装備せず、通常攻撃で敵を５体倒す
description.koreana: 무기를 장비하지 않고, 일반 공격으로 적 5마리를 쓰러뜨린다
description.schinese: 不装备武器，以普通攻击打倒5个敌人
description.tchinese: 不裝備武器，以普通攻擊打倒5個敵人

description.english: Deal over 777 damage in one hit. Consecutive hits do not count.
description.japanese: 一度の攻撃で７７７以上のダメージを与える（多段攻撃を除く）
description.koreana: 한 번의 공격으로 777 이상의 피해를 입힌다（다단 공격 제외）
description.schinese: 一次攻击造成超过777伤害（多段攻击不计）
description.tchinese: 一次攻擊造成超過777傷害（多段攻擊不計）

description.english: Deal over 999 damage by throwing weapons or materials.
description.japanese: 武器投げ・素材投げで９９９以上のダメージを与える
description.schinese: 投掷武器、素材造成超过999伤害
description.tchinese: 投擲武器、素材造成超過999傷害

description.english: Reach maximum Erosion by performing a Cursed Sword Skill.
description.japanese: 呪剣技で侵食度を最大値まで増加させる
description.koreana: 저주받은 검의 기술로 침식도를 최대치까지 올린다
description.schinese: 使用咒剑技使侵蚀度达到极限
description.tchinese: 使用咒劍技使侵蝕度達到極限

description.english: Reduce Erosion when it's at maximum.
description.japanese: 侵食度が最大値の時に侵食度を減らす
description.schinese: 解除侵蚀度极限的状态
description.tchinese: 解除侵蝕度極限的狀態

description.english: Be afflicted with 10 or more buffs, debuffs or status ailments.
description.japanese: 一度に１０種類以上の状態異常・弱体・強化状態を持つ
description.koreana: 한 번에 10종 이상의 상태이상・약화・강화 상태를 가진다
description.schinese: 同时受到10种以上的增益/减益/异常状态影响
description.tchinese: 同時受到10種以上的增益/減益/異常狀態影響

description.english: Pick up an item while carrying more than your Max Weight.
description.japanese: 重量上限を越えた状態でアイテムを拾う
description.koreana: 무게 제한을 초과한 상태에서 아이템을 줍는다
description.schinese: 于身上物品超过负重量上限的状态下捡取物品
description.tchinese: 於身上物品超過負重量上限的狀態下撿取物品

description.english: Clear 5 floors while in maximum Erosion. Outposts do not count.
description.japanese: 侵食度が最大値のままフロアを５つクリアする（休憩所を除く）
description.koreana: 침식도가 최대인 상태로 5개의 층을 클리어한다（휴게소 제외）
description.schinese: 在侵蚀度达极限的状态下前进5层楼层（不含休息区）
description.tchinese: 在侵蝕度達極限的狀態下前進5層樓層（不含休息區）

displayName.japanese: 憧れの実験兵器マスターに
displayName.schinese: 我要成为实验兵器大师
displayName.tchinese: 我要成為實驗兵器大師

description.english: Defeat an enemy with an Exp. Weapon Type-D you summon.
description.japanese: 召喚した実験兵器Ｄ型で敵を倒す
description.schinese: 召唤出的实验兵器D型成功消灭敌人
description.tchinese: 召喚出的實驗兵器D型成功消滅敵人

description.english: Create an Ember On Ground with 7 or more stacks.
description.japanese: 元素の蓄積が７以上の「地面にある炎」を作る
description.koreana: 원소 축적이 7 이상인 「지면에 깔린 화염」을 생성한다
description.schinese: 製造出元素层数达7层以上的「地面上的火焰」
description.tchinese: 製造出元素層數達7層以上的「地面上的火焰」

description.english: Cause a collision with a level of 7 or more.
description.japanese: 強さが７以上の衝突を発生させる
description.schinese: 达成7层以上的撞击强度
description.tchinese: 達成7層以上的撞擊強度

description.english: Cause poison with 7 or more stacks.
description.japanese: 毒を７以上蓄積させる
description.schinese: 累积7层以上的中毒层数
description.tchinese: 累積7層以上的中毒層數

description.english: Offer more than 5,000 Souls to the mysterious statue in one go.
description.japanese: 神秘的な彫像に１回で５，０００以上のソウルを捧げる
description.koreana: 신비로운 조각상에 한 번에 5000개 이상의 소울을 바친다
description.schinese: 单次向神秘雕像献上超过5000灵魂
description.tchinese: 單次向神秘雕像獻上超過5000靈魂

description.english: Forge all weapons.
description.japanese: 武器を全種類作る
description.schinese: 锻造所有武器
description.tchinese: 鍛造所有武器

displayName.japanese: アクセサリーコレクター

description.english: Collect all accessories.
description.japanese: アクセサリーを全種類集める
description.schinese: 收集所有饰品
description.tchinese: 收集所有飾品

description.english: Collect all memories.
description.japanese: 記憶を全種類集める
description.schinese: 收集所有记忆
description.tchinese: 收集所有記憶

description.english: Crush the chaos waiting at the end with a newborn body.
description.japanese: 生まれたての体で最果てにある混沌を打ち壊す
description.koreana: 막 태어난 몸으로 가장 끝에 있는 혼돈을 부순다
description.schinese: 带著刚甦醒的身躯击碎尽头的混沌

description.tchinese: 選擇「New game」並以硬派模式通過遊戲

displayName.japanese: 無限の牢獄へようこそ
